entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cape 6:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: 5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 5.2°C
Wind: SSE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain in the morning then to snow or ice pellets in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
